name: Contagious Magic
description:
This is a short game on the theme of "Contagious" as part of the RPG Maker Jam 3 .

Aria is bitten by a fox, somebody displaces her and James' apartment through spacetime, and things progress from there.

Find your way home, one way or another.

The gimmick is that all character advancement is through bodily contact, for example an enemy using a skill on you.

Play time is around 20 minutes.
